summary: Comprehensive testing of 2 new features completed: 1) OPD filter in admin partisipasi page, 2) Tentang tab in admin settings page. All backend tests passed (10/10). Frontend UI tests passed for both features.

issues: Console warning about chart dimensions (-1 width/height) - minor, doesn't affect functionality

passed_tests: Backend: Admin login with valid credentials
Backend: GET /api/opd returns all OPD options for filter dropdown
Backend: GET /api/partisipasi returns data with opd_id and opd_nama for filtering
Backend: Client-side filtering by OPD works correctly
Backend: GET /api/settings returns tentang fields (tentang_title, tentang_content, tentang_visi, tentang_misi)
Backend: PUT /api/settings updates tentang fields successfully
Backend: Tentang settings persist in database after update
Backend: Public Tentang page can access settings data
Frontend: Admin partisipasi page loads with OPD filter dropdown
Frontend: OPD filter dropdown shows all OPD options (Semua OPD, Dinas Pertanian, Dinas Pendidikan, Dinas Lingkungan Hidup)
Frontend: Selecting OPD filters the partisipasi table correctly (2 rows -> 1 row when filtering by Dinas Lingkungan Hidup)
Frontend: Admin settings page has 3 tabs (Branding, Hero Section, Tentang)
Frontend: Tentang tab has all required fields (Judul Halaman, Deskripsi Program, Visi, Misi)
Frontend: Save button in Tentang tab works and shows success toast
Frontend: Public Tentang page displays content from settings (title, content, visi, misi)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Both new features (OPD filter and Tentang settings) are fully functional. OPD filter uses client-side filtering with opdFilter state. Tentang settings use the same /api/settings endpoint with tentang_* fields. Test file at /app/tests/test_new_features.py covers all backend API tests for these features.
